title: UPDATE 3-Russian hackers breached Dow Jones for trading tips -Bloomberg
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
Oct 16 (Reuters) - Russian hackers had infiltrated Dow Jones & Co to steal information to trade on before it was made public, and the breach...
